Text: oh fucking baby pink floyd hmv original no where else, ohhhh shiet

From one serious Floyd fan to another - thank you.

Very much appreciated!

Un-fucking-believable! 
The live version of Comfortably Numb on this album is the best one ever recorded, it's legendary, and yet you've made it sound EVEN BETTER!
Thank you a thousand times for sharing this with us!
